stimulusHtml: Which of the following can replace  /* missing initialization */  so that the code segment works as expected?

features.html:
Consider the following method.

 

public static int[] addNum(int[] array, int first,
                           int second, int num) 
{ 
   int[] newArray = new int[array.length]; 
   newArray[first] = array[first] + num; 
   newArray[second] = array[second] + num; 
   return newArray; 
}

 

The following code segment appears in a method in the same class as  addNum.  The code segment is intended to set the contents of  array2  to  {0, 13, 9, 0}.

 

int[] array1 = /* missing initialization */;
int[] array2 = addNum(array1, 1, 2, 5);
